quote.summary: Gemilang International Limited is a Malaysia-based investment holding company that designs, fabricates, and manufactures bus bodies and assembles buses. Its segments include Sales of bus bodies and kits, Sales of parts and provision of relevant services, and Sales of program and related intellectual property (IP) rights. The Sales of bus bodies and kits segment includes the sales and fabrication of bodywork for buses and trading of body kits. The Sales of parts and provision of relevant services segment deals in spare parts for buses and provides after-sales and maintenance services for buses. The Companyâ€™s buses, comprising city buses and coaches in aluminum, are delivered to public and private bus transportation operators. Its products include single-deck, double-deck, and articulated city buses, as well as single-deck, double-deck, and high-deck coaches. It also provides after-sales services related to the maintenance of bus bodies and sales of related spare parts.
